name: Sorting Robotics
headline: We create automation technology for the cannabis industry.

founders.name: Nohtal Partansky, Founder
founders.description: Trained as an aerospace engineer and an inventor at heart. My goal is to automate all the repetitive tasks in the world to unlock the creativity of a workforce that is preoccupied with trying to make ends meet.

Item 1 of 19
Our high-tech cannabis automation solutions.
  * ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64103a06a8f9b26b5f8d960a/5f255204-92dd-4318-aab3-c4e7bedc029d/Jiko+Robot-2.jpg)
## Jiko: Automated Pre-Roll Infusion Robot
Jiko is designed to infuse various sized pre-rolls. The system utilizes both pressure and temperature to control the infusion process. Moreover, a sophisticated touchscreen interface allows the user to adjust settings to accommodate the type of concentrate being infused.
[More about Jiko](https://www.sortingrobotics.com/</jiko>)
  * ![jiko+ donut maker image](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64103a06a8f9b26b5f8d960a/3b53ce22-3eef-4726-b6e6-3bdf1e27d059/IMG_3308.png)
## Jiko+: Donut-Style Pre-Roll Infusion Robot
Take your donut / hash hole production to the next level. Our cutting-edge technology seamlessly infuses rosin into any finished pre-roll to craft Donut Joints. 
[More about Jiko+](https://www.sortingrobotics.com/</jiko-donut-maker>)
  * ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64103a06a8f9b26b5f8d960a/633bea78-3620-4bc9-ab4f-78581b8ed7f1/Jiko+Robot-36.jpg)
## omni: Desktop Vape Cartridge Filling Machine
The Omni-Filler is Sorting Robotics desktop Vape Cartridge filling machine. Fills 100 vape carts per tray in 75 seconds. The Omni-Filler reduces your labor costs - as our machine requires simply 1 operator. Accurately and precisely fill your vape carts-FAST.
[More about omni](https://www.sortingrobotics.com/</omni>)
  * ![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/64103a06a8f9b26b5f8d960a/1bf02735-7772-4863-9d95-76cfa260ba9c/DSC02145.jpg)
## Stardust: Automated Pre-Roll Dusting Robot
Utilizing A.I. and Computer Vision technologies to accurately place your finished jars in shippers. Reduce your labor costs and let us create a custom robotic solution that works for your current and future needs. 
[More about Stardust](https://www.sortingrobotics.com/</stardust-kief-coating-machine>)


## We work with the best.

### “Once we got our formula for potency and flower to oil ratio down for infusing, the ROI was instantaneous. Feedback from consumers has been nothing short of positive!”
— Sunmed Growers, Maryland
[ Request a demo ](https://www.sortingrobotics.com/</contact-us>)
## How can we help?
We specialize in automating the cannabis and technical manufacturing sectors. Our solutions integrate robotics, computer vision, and AI to enhance productivity and reduce costs.
**We are Cannabis Industry Experts****:**
  * Specialized in pre-roll and vape filling.
  * Enterprise customer support always available.
  * Partner with us for innovative and reliable automation solutions.


[ Request a Demo ](https://www.sortingrobotics.com/<https:/www.sortingrobotics.com/contact-us>)
© SORTING ROBOTICS
Backed by Y-Combinator and other prominent angels and VC’s.Manufactured in Los Angeles, CA.General Inquiries: help@sortingrobotics.comSales Inquiries: sales@sortingrobotics.comPress Inquiries: mike@greenlanecommunication.com

generated_description:
Sorting Robotics is a forward-thinking company revolutionizing the cannabis industry through innovative automation technology. Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W19, this Los Angeles-based startup consists of a dedicated team of 12 employees.

Their mission is straightforward: to create cutting-edge automation solutions that enhance efficiency and precision in cannabis processing. The company offers a suite of products designed to optimize the production of pre-rolls, vape cartridges, and infused products. Some standout innovations include:

1. **Jiko**: An automated pre-roll infusion robot that offers precise temperature and pressure control, making it easy for users to customize their infusion processes.
   
2. **Jiko+**: A specialized donut-style pre-roll infusion machine that crafts unique 'donut joints' by seamlessly integrating rosin into finished pre-rolls.

3. **Omni**: A desktop filling machine that can fill 100 vape cartridges in just 75 seconds, significantly reducing labor costs with its user-friendly design.

4. **Stardust**: An automated kief coating robot that employs AI and computer vision to manage the placement of finished products efficiently.

Sorting Robotics is committed to solving the cannabis industry's challenges by utilizing advanced data analytics and ongoing support for customers. The company has made headlines for its remarkable advancements, securing partnerships with notable industry players such as Nova Farms and Sunmed Laboratories.

For those curious about automation in cannabis processing, Sorting Robotics is a prime example of how technology can drive efficiency and innovation. Their emphasis on automation not only enhances product quality but also reduces waste—key factors in this rapidly evolving industry. If you're looking to learn more or see their technology in action, check out their website at [sortingrobotics.com](https://www.sortingrobotics.com).
